product.title: BKIND Peppermint Lip Balm in Multi
product.body_html: Sensitive and delicate, lips are affected by aggressions such as weather changes, so they need a little extra help to stay soft and well moisturized. BKIND lip balm creates a protective barrier against further cracking and brings long-term hydration to your lips, leaving a pleasant scent of fresh peppermint and a wonderful glossy finish.
